Class BusinessUnavailableException

Object

      Exception
          realtimeweb.simplebusiness.exceptions.BusinessSearchException
              realtimeweb.simplebusiness.exceptions.BusinessUnavailableException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BusinessUnavailableException
extends BusinessSearchException

Indicates that there may not be able to provide details for certain businesses, for example if they don't have any reviews yet.

Author:
acbart
